name: restaurant-management-system
description: A modern restaurant management system built with MERN stack

scripts.start: concurrently "cd backend && npm start" "cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.install: concurrently "cd backend && npm install" "cd frontend && npm install"
scripts.build: concurrently "cd backend && npm run build" "cd frontend && npm run build"
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm start"
